A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The film is based on Stephen King's short story "The Cat from Hell" has just been released on DVD, and it stars one of my favorite actors, Warwick Davis.
